body.name: John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ Thickening Shampoo for Fine Hair, Volumizing Shampoo, Biotin and Hyaluronic Acid Hair Thickening Shampoo for Women and Men, 8.3 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 mins
features: HAIR THICKENING SHAMPOO - Our thickening shampoo gets you 200% thicker*, fuller hair (*vs. a basic shampoo) instantly
SPECIAL TECHNOLOGY - This technology aligns and creates spaces between your hair fibers as you wash, resulting in hair that looks and feels thicker
EXPERTLY FORMULATED SHAMPOO - This thickening shampoo is infused with biotin and hyaluronic acid so that it visibly plumps, giving you thicker, fuller and stronger hair in just one use
TRUSTWORTHY INGREDIENTS - Our volumizing shampoo is silicone-free and vegan
MORE THAN JUST SHAMPOO - Try the whole ULTRAfiller+ line, because together, all three products (thickening shampoo, conditioner and spray) help you achieve the best results
body.description: Instantly get the look and feel of more hair. Infused with biotin and hyaluronic acid, this thickening shampoo visibly plumps, leaving you with thicker, fuller and stronger hair in only one use! Our hair thickening shampoo plumps the overall thickness of your hair by 200%* and strengthens your hair, reducing hair loss due to breakage (*vs. a basic shampoo). Our John Frieda ULTRAfiller+ technology strengthens, adding manageability to fine, fragile hair while increasing overall hair thickness and plumpness. It accomplishes this by aligning and creating spaces between hair fibers, resulting in hair that looks and feels thicker. Give fine, flat hair an instant thickening boost with this silicone-free, vegan, SLS/SLES sulfate-free volumizing shampoo.To use, work our volumizing shampoo gently through wet hair, lather and rinse well. Try the full ULTRAfiller+ thickening line, which is a 3-step process for thicker, fuller hair. Together, all three products complement each other for the best results. Step 1 is to cleanse with our thickening shampoo that visually plumps in only one use. Step 2 is to strengthen as you condition, helping to align the hair, creating thickness with our ULTRAfiller+ conditioner. Step 3 is to thicken with our thickening spray, which plumps your overall thickness and provides heat protection for fragile hair. You are one thickening shampoo away from thicker, bouncier, more resilient hair!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,737 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #74 in Hair Shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow really works
reviews.reviewText: I bought the shampoo, conditioner and spray, and the three together have made my hair so much fuller and silkier. I love this so far I’ve only washed my hair twice since I received it but both times I had excellent results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very thin hair and my hair in the front temples are receding/ baby hair. This shampoo changed my hair COMPLETELY! Honestly gave me so much volume I don’t know what to do with it lol. Only the shampoo I use and no conditioner and no other product and it worked amazing. I started to use the spray as well a few weeks later and not conditioner cause I have very oily hair and with the spray it gave me even more volume. I’m not sure how to style my hair cause it’s so voluminous and full. My baby hair in front are plump and cover the receding hair. This was not a sponsored review- it’s my honest review and I found a shampoo I can use and make me feel good about my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It did work at thickening a bit but it leaves my hair so soft. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair has always been thin, This works!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this, after many other products in my 70 plus years, hoping it would work. I lathered up in the shower, rinsed it out when I was finished with my shower, and my hair has been so much thicker feeling and manageable. I am really amazed and I'm a retired cosmetologist. It may not work for everyone, but for the first time of using, it is wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine haired people rejoice!
reviews.reviewText: I have baby fine hair that always looks flat, so I am always skeptical of the promises of hair care products, but I try them anyway and they usually disappoint. The John Frieda Full Volume line does nothing for me. I've been using this thickening shampoo and conditioner for a little over a week and I am hooked. My hair looks and feels noticably thicker without the stiffness that I've experienced with other thickening products. This is my go-to from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does volumize your hair. A little too heavy for my thin and fine hair.
reviews.reviewText: I can tell you that the volume does increase, but I have very thin and fine hair and I feel it was a bit too heavy for my hair. I will try to use a little less and not keep it in as long and see if that helps the situation. But for the price you might as well try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this and it really works.
reviews.reviewText: I am a breast cancer patient. My hair was already thin but got even worse. I still have to use real human hair toppers but the rest of my hair is thickened by this shampoo and conditioner. I highly highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your money
reviews.reviewText: From eitherI purchased the shampoo, the conditioner and the thickening spray. I am using them together. My hair is extremely limp and his static electricity. This product does not deliver at all. I don't understand why these products are marketed when they don't work.
